column2: There are many mysteries in the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. It might be interesting to spend some time delving into the old texts of  [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
There are many mysteries in the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. It might be interesting to listen more to the ancient stories told by the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s.

In the past few months, you have been spending many nights reading [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. The texts contain many items of wisdom and also give hints to the most important mysteries of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].

In the past few months, you have spent many nights listening to the old myths and stories of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. The tales told of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] are most inspiring and contain much wisdom that can help you in your daily life.

Your dedication to religious pursuits has been noticed around the realm. Among others, it has quite impressed [target_priest.GetTitledName]. You have maintained correspondence on various religious and philosophical matters for some time, and find that you are rapidly becoming good friends.

The holy site of [holy_site_visiting.GetName] is an important center of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. Many great religious events are celebrated there, and the spirit of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] is said to permeate the entire area.
Your visit to [holy_site_visiting.GetName] was certainly worth the time! You have wandered around in its sacred halls and pondered the atmosphere and the religious mysteries that lie hidden here.

I live my life as other [Root.GetMenWomen] do, navigating its rocks and obstacles, doing my best to achieve success in my endeavours. Still, everything we do takes place in the light of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], and we must take care lest the influence of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] comes into our lives.

There are those in your realm who worship other gods. For example, it is known to you that [target_character.GetTitledName] openly follows the [target_character.Religion.GetName] faith. You sometimes wonder what [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] would think of your association with these people.

For a long while now, you have not felt the presence of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] in your thoughts. You are starting to wonder whether there really is any truth in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] or if perhaps it is just an old book written by clever liars.

For a long time now, you have not felt the presence of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] in your thoughts. You are starting to question whether the gods exist at all, or if they are just tales people made up to explain the world...

With your strong devotion to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, you have spent countless hours reading [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and thinking about the meaning and origin of the sacred words therein. There are some things that don't quite correspond to what the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s are saying in their sermons, however...
I have spent years studying the basic tenets and beliefs of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, and by now I consider myself quite an advanced [Root.Religion.GetName] scholar.
As I prayed before the altar, I was suddenly filled with an overwhelming sense of love. Crying with joy, I knew that I am never truly alone. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is always with me.
Deep in meditation, I felt the most intense bliss I have ever experienced as a great energy traveled up my spine, opening my Chakras to my own eternal being. Om Namah Shivaya!
At Isha prayer, my mind was suddenly filled with a vision of the Prophet, riding Al-Buraq through the starry skies with a sword in his hand. It felt more real than waking life...

As I cut the throat of the ram, it suddenly stopped struggling and looked me straight in the eyes. Even as its blood filled the grooves on the altar, I knew that [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] was with me!
Yet another morning when I wake up feeling as tired as when I went to bed. I should do something about my listless mind... Perhaps I need to spend some time alone.
I have gained a newfound respect for the hermits of old! My time spent fasting and praying in seclusion has done me good. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] has helped me strengthen my mind.
Secluded in my cave, meditating on the teachings of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I have gained better control over my thoughts and desires.
Curled up safely in the badger's den, I've steeled my mind against the ululating shadow men who stalk me outside. I wonder how long I have been holed up in here?
Secluded in my cave, I have subsisted only on the sacred roots and bitter juices favored by the priests. My thoughts are clear: It is by will alone I set my mind in motion.
I resolve to be a better [Root.GetManWoman]
